comment.author: 22694125@N02
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called artland, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 56656338@N06
comment._content: It is so unbelievable to think of how far down the wrong end of politics we have come. It seems almost like every election in modern times are about how bad the other candidates are, instead of trying to boast how one would improve the public situation. This banner is a symbol of a better political time, where punishments were harsh, morals were strong, and the people respected our country and our dream.

comment.author: 8207694@N08
comment._content: I love looking at these historical photos! They are truly amazing!
